amendment.description: Amendment defines what constitutes a sale at a gun show; requires background checks at gun shows to be completed within 24 hours; allows dealers to deal at gun shows face-to-face; and increases the penalty for those who use guns with a large-capacity magazine during the commission of crimes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 1 and printed in part B of H. Rept. 106-186 to specify 24 consecutive hours for instant background check elapsed time period purposes; allow dealers to transfer inventories in person; and increase the penalties for using a large capacity ammunition magazine during crimes of violence or drug trafficking.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dingell amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 218 - 211 (Roll no. 234).
